Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Ada
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th  buses temp. rerouted SB: 119th, Halsted, 115th, Marshfield, 119th; NB: 119th, Ashland, 115th, Halsted and 119th, near 119th/Ada.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 119th/Ada, due to, street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via: 119th, Halsted, 115th, Marshfield, 119th

Northbound buses will operate via: 119th, Ashland, 115th, Halsted and 119th.

Allow extra travel time.
